mapper.select: SELECT count(estatus) as estatus FROM empleado WHERE id_empleado = #{idEmpleado} AND estatus ='I'

SELECT d.codigo_emp_doc AS codigoEmpDoc, d.estatus,c.descripcion AS descripcionDocumento FROM empleado_documentos d LEFT JOIN catalogo c ON c.codigo = d.codigo_emp_doc WHERE id_empleado = #{idEmpleado}

SELECT c.descripcion AS perfil_empleado, e.nombre AS nombre, e.apellido_pat AS apellido_pat, e.apellido_mat AS apellido_mat, CASE WHEN e.estatus = 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN e.estatus = 'I' THEN 'Suspendido' END AS estatus, e.calificacion AS calificacion FROM empleado e LEFT JOIN catalogo c ON c.codigo = e.codigo_puesto WHERE e.id_cuadrilla = #{idCuadrilla} ORDER BY e.estatus, e.fecha_ingreso
